markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Chelish Rebel](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=105)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Old Cheliax

</column>

You joined the fight against House Thrune. You may have helped liberate the nation of Ravounel, or you might be involved in another rebellion, such as Pezzack’s, that studied Ravounel’s successes.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Kintargo Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Streetwise](/Feats.aspx?ID=846) skill feat.
name: Chelish Rebel

text: Chelish Rebel Source World Guide pg. 106 2.0 Region Old Cheliax You joined the fight against House Thrune. You may have helped liberate the nation of Ravounel, or you might be involved in another rebellion, such as Pezzack’s, that studied Ravounel’s successes. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and the Kintargo Lore skill. You gain the Streetwise skill feat.
